mapper.sql: ID, GID, WORK_DATE, STOCK_NAME, INCRE_PER, INCREASE, TODAY_START_PRI, YESTOD_END_PRI, NOW_PRI, TODAY_MAX, TODAY_MIN, TRA_NUMBER, TRA_AMOUNT, GMT_CREATED, CREATOR, GMT_MODIFIED, MODIFIER, IS_DELETED
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from STOCK_INFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select SEQSTOCKINFO.nextval from dual
insert into STOCK_INFO (ID, GID, WORK_DATE, STOCK_NAME, INCRE_PER, INCREASE, TODAY_START_PRI, YESTOD_END_PRI, NOW_PRI, TODAY_MAX, TODAY_MIN, TRA_NUMBER, TRA_AMOUNT, GMT_CREATED, CREATOR, GMT_MODIFIED, MODIFIER, IS_DELETED ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{increPer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{increase,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{todayStartPri,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yestodEndPri,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nowPri,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{todayMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{todayMin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{traNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{traAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR} )

update STOCK_INFO
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
GID = #{record.gid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_DATE = #{record.workDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOCK_NAME = #{record.stockName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCRE_PER = #{record.increPer,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INCREASE = #{record.increase,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TODAY_START_PRI = #{record.todayStartPri,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YESTOD_END_PRI = #{record.yestodEndPri,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NOW_PRI = #{record.nowPri,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

TODAY_MIN = #{record.todayMin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRA_NUMBER = #{record.traNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRA_AMOUNT = #{record.traAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GMT_CREATED = #{record.gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GMT_MODIFIED = #{record.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{record.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETED = #{record.isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR},

update STOCK_INFO set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, GID = #{record.gid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_DATE = #{record.workDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOCK_NAME = #{record.stockName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCRE_PER = #{record.increPer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INCREASE = #{record.increase,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TODAY_START_PRI = #{record.todayStartPri,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YESTOD_END_PRI = #{record.yestodEndPri,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NOW_PRI = #{record.nowPri,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TODAY_MAX = #{record.todayMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TODAY_MIN = #{record.todayMin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRA_NUMBER = #{record.traNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRA_AMOUNT = #{record.traAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GMT_CREATED = #{record.gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{record.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GMT_MODIFIED = #{record.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{record.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETED = #{record.isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}

update STOCK_INFO
GID = #{gid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_DATE = #{workDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

INCRE_PER = #{increPer,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INCREASE = #{increase,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TODAY_START_PRI = #{todayStartPri,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
